text: Club Deportivo Santanyí is a football team based in Santanyí in the autonomous community of Balearic Islands. Founded in 1968, it plays in the Tercera División - Group 11. Its stadium is Estadi Municipal de Santanyí with a capacity of 4,000 seats. ==History== Club Deportivo Santanyí was founded in 1968.
